unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Ah, there will be plenty of times when I sleep after sleeping, when I sleep before sleeping, when I always wake up while sleeping.
Well, now we have the problem of falling asleep anytime, day or night, forever and then never waking up.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: It is a pity that you can't sleep all day, even if you do it during the day. You have to wake up every night, even if you don't want to. I'll never be able to sleep again.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Well, we'll have no sleep at all until we wake up in the evening. Always sleepwalk until we get home.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Oh, there'll be plenty of sleeping when I'm asleep. I'll sleep whenever I want to, no matter what time it is.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Well, now I can go to bed and sleep: whatever happens, I'll wake up tomorrow morning!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Oh, sleeping later is going to be a problem too, waking up early and staying awake all night, even if you wake up one day, it will never happen again.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Ah, there will be plenty of times when I can sleep after sleeping. I can sleep day and night, always not waking up.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I hope we can all afford to take naps in the future; when we go, we'll be asleep, forever.

Now, seeing how cheerful and lively you are looking today and how nice it is to see you smile and laugh, I don't want to miss the chance of spending time with you.

It is now that much the better for me, however.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Only because I heard that my wife is a dangerous woman, I can't help myself. Now that I see my wife is happy and sweet-tempered, why don't I come here?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Every day in my ear is the rumour that there's something wrong with you; I believe them so blindly that I've kept back my fears. Today when I saw how sweet and pleasant you looked, how warm and loving your smile was, I couldn't help coming.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The fact that the other day I heard from you that her husband was a troublemaker in front of me, so I was scared to come over. So she got me. Now I see her as someone who is very serious and kind. How can I not come over?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): What I found most remarkable was that, although I had heard that the woman in question existed, I had never seen her face to face. The people talking about her on the更要命的阴历一天还说她是'一个值得交朋友的人',于是我就信了,不敢相信。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Only now do I know that the woman next door is a clever person, and she can't be wronged in front of you, so she scared me. Now I see the woman next door is very happy, why didn't I come here?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I've heard say recently that you are a very smart girl and you don't know how to word your answers; so I thought I'd be scared away. Now, look! Me and all the other boys in the village call you the nicest sweetheart they've ever seen. How can I miss the chance of seeing you?'

english: The one who nursed her the most was Hunter Qi's daughter-in-law, called Feng. Feng had the strong, solid frame of the women of the Northeast. She ate sorghum every day, and her large breasts were full of milk even though she was feeding two babies at the same time.

chinese: 父亲，一九五七年，你躲在我家里间屋里那个地洞里时，你每日每夜，在永恒的黑暗中，追忆流水年月，你至少三百六十次想到了我们家那几十间房屋的屋盖在大火中塌落的情景。 你想到你的父亲我的爷爷在那时刻想到了什么，我的幻想紧追着你的幻想，你的幻想紧追着爷爷的思维。
english: Father, when you were hiding in the burrow we dug for you in the floor of my home back in 1957, you recalled those days of your past in the unrelenting darkness. On no fewer than 365 occasions, in your mind you saw the roof of your house crash down amid the flames, and wondered what was going through the mind of your father, my granddad. So my fantasies were chasing yours while yours were chasing Granddad's.

I thought about what my father my grandfather thought about the situation at that time. My imagination followed your imagination, and your imagination followed his thoughts.

In 1957, when you hid yourself in my house during that dead-end dark of the city, you spent every day, every night, retracing the progress of the years that had fallen into the fire. You've dreamed that your father Mr Li didn't think about how our houses had collapsed due to the大火. You have continued to think about his thought until it was finally realized by your grandfather.

You dreamed about what your father, my grandfather, was thinking at that moment, while my imagination followed yours, and then your imagination followed mine.

In 1957, during the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution, you hid in one of the tunnels in my house. Every night you, Father, traced your thoughts back to the thousands of rooms in our estate that had burned to the ground during the uprising. How many times did you think, Father? I chased your thoughts, and they chased Granddad's mind.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The old eunuch faced the other man and a grimace. 'What does any of that really mean?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The sea cucumber's face darkened and he said, "What is the use of lending this to Rui?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The old eunuch's face fell. 'By lending this little fellow a helping hand, do you think what I've done now?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: His face fell as he said, 'What does it matter to give this son of a JG any money?'"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old eunuch frowned. 'What does borrowing do a young man like Wu Jiang anything?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The sea cucumber face sank, saying, "What use is it to lend this youth?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old eunuch's face fell. 'Huh! Why do you lend things to that little Rui guy for?

chinese: 如果发生你所说的超过百分之一振幅的波动，这条线就会变红并将波动显示出来。
english: If the kind of fluctuation you anticipate—in excess of one percent—occurs, this line would turn red and become a waveform.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: If the wave you describe exceeds 1% of its peak amplitude, this line will turn red and display the wave.
If you mentioned an amplitude less than one percent that went above the band, this line would turn red and show what happened.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: If a fluctuation of more than 1% occurs, this line will turn red and display the fluctuation.
If, by the percentage variations you're talking about, a line changes color and displays the fluctuation, that's what we call 'seeing.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: If you speak about a wave exceeding the 1% amplitude, this line will turn red and display the wave.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: If you mentioned an amplitude above one percent where the wave would explode, the plot would turn red.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: If you say that there is a one percent amplitude fluctuation above this line, then it will change color and show the fluctuation.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: If by some miracle a one percent variation occurred, the curve would turn red and show the difference.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: If you speak about a wave exceeding your specified percentage amplitude, the line will turn red and display the wave.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you mentioned an amplitude greater than one percent, the wave would turn red and be displayed.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: If you say that there is a one percent amplitude variation, this line will turn red and show the variation.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If, by some fortunate accident, there is a one percent difference between two consecutive cycles, the line will colorate and display the difference.

chinese: 如今出挑的美人儿似的，少说着只怕有一万心眼子；再要赌口齿，十个会说的男人也说不过他呢！
english: She's grown up to be a real beauty too, has Mrs Lian. But sharp! Well, if it ever comes to a slanging match, she can talk down ten grown men any day of the week!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Now she is a kind of woman who makes you want to say something but can't say it because there's only one mouth that speaks to her; then, if she wants to bet words, ten men would not be able to explain him!

Those on the cusp of adulthood must know by now that being a beautiful one is no sign of intelligence; besides, even those men who aren't very clever will try to argue with them about it anyway, because they know how important it is.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Now that she is out on her own, she may have a thousand wits; even if you talk with her for ten minutes, no man can talk with her more than one hundred times!

A young beauty like this is a very dangerous asset. If we gambit her, ten men would be hard put to it to keep up with her; and if we don't gamble, we've still got to be able to speak fluently, and nobody can speak better than a lady like her.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Out of sight, out of mind."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: People who shine more than others is better; a man who tells the truth is more popular than one who doesn't.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Now a young beauty like this, if one were to talk of her thoughts, there would be as many as ten thousand; even ten men who could speak would not be able to say anything about her!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She sounds like a young beauty going out to dance whom her gentleman friend promises to accompany; for all that, not only has he mastered the hardest languages in the land, but to take part in a debate on them would be to give him far more than he would have ever expected!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Now, a woman who is out of her depth! She might have one thousand eyes if she spoke more; ten men would not be able to tell him from his words!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Having reached the peak of elegance, only a thousand mental pixels were better left unused; and if he were to engage in lively discourse, his words probably would fail him ten times over!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Now she is a beautiful woman on the outs, with a thousand eyes. Even if we talk about words, ten men will not be able to say it!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She thinks of the handsome young man with the thousand-eyes, who, when he makes a debate with you, will win because there isn't another speaker in the world as good at tongue-talking as he is!

chinese: 我办过一个盗窃案，罪犯能把行驶中的列车中间的一节车厢偷了，前后的其余部分又完好地接起来开到终点站，用的工具只是一根钢丝绳和几只铁钩子。
english: I once handled a robbery where the criminals managed to steal one car out of a moving train. They reconnected the cars before and after the one they were interested in so that the train got all the way to its destination without anyone noticing. The only tools they used were a length of wire cable and a few steel hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: I committed a theft once, and the criminal could steal from the middle of the train, and the other parts were perfectly intact after that, using tools just one piece of steel rope and several iron hooks.

I committed a robbery several times. The robber would steal a section of the trainbeds from the back, put on the front, and keep the entire shipbuilding building from turning up at the end, with tools just a raw stock of steel chains and some iron hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: I had done a robbery where the thief was able to steal one compartment of a train while the rest were intact and reconnected at the end station using just a piece of wire and some iron hooks.
I solved a theft case where the perpetrator had moved a section of the train between stations with no one noticing.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I was involved in a theft before, and the thief could steal from one of the passenger cars' sections of the train between the front and rear, then connect them back together after they had finished traveling on their way to the destination station, using just a piece of wire and a few metal hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I committed a theft once. The perpetrator would steal a section of the trainbeds from the back end and replace it with a intact center carriage, with a few bricolage tools, including a raw piece of steel rope and a few iron hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I have handled a theft case. The thief could steal one section of a train that was moving on the tracks, while the rest of it was intact and connected together to be driven to its destination using just a piece of wire and some iron hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I solved a theft case back when. The criminal had moved an entire section of the train between two stations using a steel cable and some iron hooks, and only used these tools. . . .
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: I have committed a theft case, and the culprit could steal the entire first floor of a train car after it had started moving, then connect the remaining parts back up at the end station using only a single piece of steel cable and several metal hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I committed a theft several times. One of them roamed the entire car, restored one of the车厢的完整性, and used a single piece of steel cable.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I have handled a robbery case where a thief managed to steal one compartment of a train while it was moving on the tracks, then uselessly reassemble it with some iron hooks and a steel rope before using it to get the train to its destination.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I solved a theft case where the criminal had stole a section of train car while it was still in progress, and then used steel wire and a bunch of iron hooks to bend the remaining parts of the train together and take it back to the station where it was supposed to have ended. That's all he needed besides the steel wire.

chinese: 老耿那时已七十多岁，孤身一人，享受“五保”待遇，是村里德高望重的人物，每逢诉苦大会，都要他上台诉苦。 每次诉苦，他都要剥掉上衣，露出一片疤痕。
english: Old Geng, who was already over seventy by then and lived alone as a pensioner, was one of our most revered villagers. Asked to speak at meetings to air grievances against the old order, he invariably stripped to the waist onstage to show his scars.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: In old age, when he was seventy years old, he was alone on his own. He was a respected figure of the village, and whenever someone complained about something, he would be called up to speak. Every time they complained, he would peel off his clothes revealing a scar.
Old Geng was a seventy-year-old man, alone and single, who enjoyed the welfare grant of "five resides," given to poor elders and retired men on镇政府的德高望重的人物。 Whenever they met for恳职大会，他就要扒了衣服，露出了疤。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Lao Ge was seventy years old then, alone, enjoying "Five Guarantees" benefits, a person of great respect in the village, he would always be asked to speak at the meeting. At each meeting, he would take off his shirt, exposing a scar.

Old Geng had been alone all his life, enjoying five-star benefits as a village veteran. Every month he attended a meeting where he was required to complain. Every time, he took off his shirt, revealing the rows of scars covering his back.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: At that time, Old Teng was seventy years old and had no family or friends, enjoying the "old age pension"待遇，and was highly regarded by villagers who were respected for their wisdom and character. Whenever he heard about his fellow villagers' complaints at the complaint meeting, he would go up on stage and complain bitterly.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Old Geng was a seventy-year-old man, single-registered absent-mindedly on benefit land, a very high-sounding name in the village, and whenever every monthly hardship speech大会上他上台演讲,剥光衬衫露出个疤。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Old General was seventy years old then, alone, enjoying "Five Guards" benefits, he was a person of high moral character in the village. He had to speak at every meeting where people complained, each time he would remove his shirt and show a scar.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Old Geng had fallen on hard times and was enjoying full benefits as a 'five-star' beneficiary of the village. Every month he went to see the county governor, who would hear him complain about his lot. Always bare-chested, he exposed the scars that dotted his upper arm.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: At that time, he was eighty-seven years old, alone on his own, enjoying “five-star待遇”， a figure of great honor among the villagers, who often attended the complaint meeting. Whenever he had trouble to tell his story, he would have him strip off his clothes and expose the scars on his chest.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng was a seventy-year-old man, single-occupancy alone, a member of the five-generations reduced pensioners of the village. When every meeting for the five-reward communal amnesty took place, he was given to speak, and each time, they took off his shirt to reveal a scar.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Old Jin was seventy years old then, living alone, enjoying "five guarantees" benefits, a person of high moral standing in the village, every time he complained at meetings had to go up on stage to complain. Every time he complained, he would have to take off his shirt, expose a scar.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng had already be over seventy years old. He lived alone, enjoying full benefits as a 'five-star veteran,' and every month he attended a meeting where he was required to read out a limited selection of errors he'd committed. Every time, he took off his shirt, revealing the rows of scars that dotted his upper body.

chinese: 我走过去，告诉他，这牛被毒蛇咬了，不能干活。
english: I went over to tell him that the buffalo had been bitten by a poisonous snake and couldn't work.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: I walked over and told him that the horse had been bitten by a snake. He couldn’t work.
I walked over to告诉他：那头牛已经被毒蛇咬住了。不能再干活了。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: I walked over and told him that the ox had been bitten by a snake and could not work any longer.
I went over to tell him that the bull had been bitten by a snake and couldn't do any work.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I walked over and told him that this horse was poisoned by a snake. He cannot work today.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I walked over to him and told him that the snake had killed the buffalo and asked him to stay off of it.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I walked over and told him that this bull had been bitten by a snake and could not work.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I went over to him, told him that the buffalo had been bitten by a snake and was unable to work.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: I approached him and said that the horse had been poisoned by a snake. I could not work with it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I walked over to him and told him that the camel had been poisoned by a snake. He couldn't work today.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I walked over and told him that the bull had been bitten by a snake and could not work.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I went over to tell him that the buffalo had been bitten by a snake and couldn't work.

chinese: 这天下午，程先生提前下班，买了菜到王琦瑶处，两人将孩子哄睡了，便一起忙了起来，一边忙一边说话。
english: On the afternoon of the dinner Mr. Cheng left work early to pick up the food for that evening. They put the baby to bed early and chatted as they cooked.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: This evening, Mr. Chen bought vegetables at Ouyang Guoran's house and then took them home together. He was busy talking as he prepared food for the children.

On the way home, Mr. Cheng took some soup to warm Wang Qiyao's child while she slept; they both lay down together, talked as much during their dinner time as they could manage, and then changed into clothes and headed out of the apartment building.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: That afternoon, Mr Cheng left work early, bought some groceries at Wang Qiuyue’s place, and went back with them to take care of their son until they fell asleep together. They talked as they worked.
Mr. Cheng left work early that afternoon and bought some groceries on his way to Wang Qiyao's. They divided up the chores while they waited for the baby to fall asleep—cooking, cleaning, and talking.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: On this afternoon, Mr. Cheng was already home after a long day at work. He bought some food for his wife, Wang Guo'er, when he arrived home. They went to sleep together and started working. They talked while they were working.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: On the way home, Cheng Yuhuang took early off from work and, getting a bit ahead of schedule, bought some groceries for his family and took the two-year-old out on the walk. Once there, he divided his time between preparing dinner and talking to the child; as they spoke, he spoke.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: That afternoon, Mr Cheng left work early and went to Wang Qi'er’s house with some food. They took care of the children and then got busy together while talking.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Mr. Cheng arrived home early that afternoon and, with a bottle of wine in one hand and a loaf of bread in the other, went to Wang Qiyao's place. They took care of the child while they chatted.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: This afternoon, Mr. Chen left home early and bought some food at Mrs. Wang's house. He took his daughter to bed, so he started working on it. While working, they talked together.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That afternoon, as soon as Shanghai offered up her hourly production of business activity, which was空前的活跃，程先生却提前下班，买了一篮子菜回家，给孩子喂过夜后，再一并交给王琦瑶去做事。然后就各干各的事，一边干一边说。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: That afternoon, Mr Cheng left work early and went over to Wang Qi'eryao's with some food for the kids, then they both got busy cooking while chatting.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Mr. Cheng left work early that afternoon, bought some groceries, and arrived at Wang Qiyao's place just in time to help Hong Xiyaobo get her baby asleep. While they were busy tidying up and talking, the baby fell asleep too.

chinese: 后因曹雪芹于悼红轩中，披阅十载，增删五次，纂成目录，分出章回，又题曰《金陵十二钗》，并题一绝。
english: Cao Xueqin in his Nostalgia Studio worked on it for ten years, in the course of which he rewrote it no less than five times, dividing it into chapters, composing chapter headings, renaming it The Twelve Beauties of Jinling, and adding an introductory quatrain.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: After Tang Zhenfeng was reading through the novel at the Red Room of悼红阁时， he had completed ten volumes on it; then he compiled them into a book titled "The Hundred Faced Ladies of Nine Courts".

Later on he had further read it ten times and revised five times in his study at loss for the purpose of compiling all his thoughts into a first volume entitled 'A Dream of Golden Days'. A summary of each chapter was written with each line followed by a word from the old testament (chapter twenty-one) and six lines from an extract from the story of Bao-yu's love for Shi Xiang-ru.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: After Liu Xueqin read through Red Lotus Pavilion ten times, he revised it five times, compiled a table of contents, divided them into chapters and parts, and wrote "The Twelve Daughters of Jiuling" on the back. He also wrote a poem.

Some time afterwards came the appearance of Cao Xu. In his Memorial Hall (erected shortly before his death, and known now as the Jia Rui Hall) he proceeded to write a novel with ten books in all, adding between these volumes a series of individual stories, entitled The Twelve Countesses of Nanking. He worked on this for ten years, adding and revising and editing and finally publishing the work under the title of The Complete Story of the Twelve Countesses of Nanking, with a single elegy in it in which the author commended the book to readers' attention.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: After曹雪芹在悼红轩中历时十年，遍阅十载，增删五次，编纂了目录，又将它分为章回，还写了两首诗。
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Having been entrusted with the task of revising the original text after Aroma's suicide, Jia Rui's mind had reverted to the composition of The Story of the情怀, that is, the composition of the book in which it was to be published. chinese: 平安里的一日生计，是在喧嚣之中拉开帷幕；粪车的轱辘声，涮马桶声，几十个煤球炉子在弄堂里升烟，隔夜洗的衣衫也晾出来了，竹竿交错，好像在烟幕中升旗。
english: Mornings, however, begin with night-soil carts, clattering in to collect waste for fertilizer, and the raspy noises of brushes scrubbing out commodes. Amid the smoke of coal burners, laundry soaked overnight is taken out to be hung, banner-like, on bamboo poles.

The daily tasks of Peace Lane all converge on a stage of tumultuous activity. The rattle of the grumblings of the looters or the rotating spindles of the sores who screech through the longtang becomes mixed with the laundry noises of countless coal-heap stoves to create a skyline that rises and falls like the sun screening the flag as it rises in the fog.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: A day's wage at Peaceful Street is being launched amidst a cacophony; the sound of a horse-drawn cart wheeling through the alleyway, the sound of a toilet brush scraping against porcelain, the clattering of dozens of coal-oil stoves, and the overnight washing clothes hanging out on the lines; the bamboo poles interlocking, it seems as if they were raising the flag in the smoke-filled air.

The hustle-bustle-ah-ah of Peace Lane ushered in yet another day. Vendors' tugs on their carts awakened the neighborhood; through the longtang doors, the cooking smoke from a dozen or so stoves drifted outside, forming a sort of flag in the air.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The daily life of a place called Peace Village is laid out before us in the midst of noise; the creaking sound of the plow, the dingy sound of the toilet, and the smoke from dozens of coal-burning ovens that rise from the streets, along with the clothes hanging up on bamboo poles as if they were being raised by clouds.

chinese: “审判日”号宽阔的甲板上很空荡，只是后甲板上有一个人在用水龙头冲洗缆桩，汪淼从高处看得很清楚，当船的这一部分从钢柱间移过的瞬间，那人的身体突然僵硬了，水龙头从他手里滑落；与此同时，连接龙头的胶皮水带也在不远处断成两截，水从那里白花花地喷了出来，那人直直地站了几秒钟就倒下了，他的身体在接触甲板的同时分成两截。

The man's body stiffened, and the nozzle tumbled from his hand. He remained standing for a few seconds, then fell. As his body contacted the deck, it came apart in two halves.

chinese: 其实伟大友谊不真也不假，就如世上一切东西一样，你信它是真，它就真下去。 你疑它是假，它就是假的。 我的话也半真不假。 但是我随时准备兑现我的话，哪怕天崩地裂也不退却。

chinese: 她曾经盼望着早日成婚，但从女伴的话语中隐隐约约听到单家公子是个麻风病患者，奶奶的心凉了，奶奶向她的父母诉说着心中的忧虑。 外曾祖父遮遮掩掩不回答，外曾祖母把奶奶的女伴们痛骂一顿，其意大概是说狐狸吃不到葡萄就说葡萄是酸的之类。
english: Eager to marry, she heard innuendos from her girlfriends that the Shan boy was afflicted with leprosy, and her dreams began to evaporate. Yet, when she shared her anxieties with her parents, Great-Granddad hemmed and hawed, while Great-Grandma scolded the girlfriends, accusing them of sour grapes.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: She had hoped to marry soon, but her words from a female companion hinted at an incurable illness for Senior Brother Xuan of the Blind Family, causing her grandmother's heart to ache. Her parents were unable to speak to her about this, since their grandfather had remained silent throughout the war. Her auntie was even more insistent, saying that it was not right to treat others like children.

She had longed to tie a marriage contract, but from what Female Friend said she began to fear that her grandfather was sick and would refuse to answer her questions when she asked about his health. Her grandfather had initially answered her with a mixture of anger and disgust, making it very clear that Grandmother should be angry at the female page逢蒙不好。 Her mother had screamed at her cousin for a message to be given when she heard her cousin's words. It was probably: 'Foe the wine is worse than the apple (if you've been eaten by a fox).'

The old grandfather didn’t answer, nor did the old aunt scold her female companion as if saying, “The fox can’t eat the grapes because they are sour.”

She had long wanted to get married, but gradually came to realize that the gentlemanly Shan family patient was leprous. Granddad didn't say anything about this concern to his parents, who refused to listen; they blamed Grandma for being lured by the attractive company of a wolf's daughter rather than concentrating on her own feelings.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: She had hoped to get married soon, but she could hear that single man was a patient with meningitis from her female companions. unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She had longed to tie a ribbon round her ringbearer's waist, but as female companions described their new mistress with disdain, she began to feel cold on inside her heart. Her grandfather, who at one time had wished to be fatherless, told her father that the young Lord of the Chang brothers was a leper. The old woman ordered her to send her there, and Granddad shouted at his girls: 'Husbands! Don't you let your girlfriends cheat you! It's like a girl who hasn't been had on by her husband will say when she sees her boyfellow after she leaves home—' and then she stomped her hands and feet against the women's forearms. That was什么意思， "Leep' the fox doesn't eat grapes, it's like a piglet's said when he sees his lover standing in the doorway—' She wanted her parentsto understand how it felt to be left out while her aunties loved her. The old woman had imagined that if her cousin were healthy she would have been fatherless, and had now changed her mind on that front. Her parents had warned her that being left out could lead to disappointment; they had argued about whether she should continue to be single or not. chinese: 将她抱起，坐在椅上，说道：“你瞧着，我在你身上各个部位指点，倘若指得对的，你就眨三下眼睛，指得不对，眼睛睁得大大的，一动也不能动。
english: He lifted her up in his arms and sat her down in a chair. 'Now look,' he said, 'I'm going to start pointing to places on your body. If I point to the right place, blink three times; if it isn't right, just keep your eyes open and don't move.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Look at her, sit on a chair, and say: 'I'll tell you what I mean in each of your body parts. If it's right, you'll raise one eyebrow three times. If it's wrong, open your eyes wide. You can't move a single inch.'

I showed her the different parts of your body where you could be trained, and told her to close her eyes as I pointed with a stick. The goal was that she blinked three times if the teaching was correct, and opened her eyes again if the teacher said anything else.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Pick her up and sit her down on a chair. "Look at me. I'll show you where to touch and if my finger is right, just blink your eyes three times. If it's wrong, keep your eyes open wide, and don't move."

He carried her back to his chair, sat her down on it, and said: 'I'll show you! If I'm right in pointing out where the trouble is, just blink your eyes; if I've missed anything, keep them open very wide. You mustn't move or speak or make a sound.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Look at her, point out each part of your body as you sit on a chair. I said that if it's right, you'll blink three times, if not, raise your eyes to the size of a large egg."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I showed you the different parts of your face, as she said. The more you look at them, the more you close your eyes; the more you don't move your face, she told me.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Look at her from head to toe, pointing out each part of your body. If you get it right, you'll raise your eyebrows three times. If not, open your eyes wide and do not move a single step."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I'll hold you still here. Sit down on a chair and look at her from all angles. If you can point correctly, you must pick up where I left off and open your eyes. Let's see how you feel when I tell you.

english: There are some really dangerous people among that Mu lot, you can't afford to take any chances.

chinese: 只觉天涯茫茫，到处是鞑子的天下，真无一片干净土地，沉吟道：“桃源何处，可避暴秦？
english: The whole world belonged to the Tartars now, it seemed. Not a single patch of land was free of their hated presence. He thought of the poet Tao Yuanming's story about the fisherman who, by following a stream that flowed between flowering peach trees, had stumbled on an earthly paradise—a place where refugees from ancient tyranny had found a haven.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Only felt that the world was so vast, where the treacherous Qin were everywhere; truly there is no pure land to hide from, I pondered and said: "Where can one escape the barbarian?

But as he traveled on, his eyes wandered off to where the Tartars rule; and there was really not a green place in view, and so he found himself asking 'Which桃花世界' (How can we escape from this Tertioral Empire of the Treachery)?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: It felt like I was wandering through a vast land of desolation with no clean land to hide, so I said to myself, "Where is the place where one can escape from the tyranny of暴秦?"

They seemed to drift from one decaying province into another, searching always for a place where the Tartars might still be free. Finally Dang introduced them to the metaphorical oasis of Utopia. 'Where can we hide ourselves, O Great Duke? When all Heaven is filled with Mongoys?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Only that all is foreign, everywhere is a barbarous world; really there is no one clean land, pondering thoughtfully: "Where shall I hide from the barbarians?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But everywhere he looked it was the Tartar way, and there is really not a patch of unaltered soil in this vast empire where he could hide himself in tranquillity. 'And what can there be of enchanting allure in the桃花源?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Only felt that the world was endless, everywhere were the Qing Dynasty, there was no clean land, pondered, "Where is the peach valley, can escape from the暴秦?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The journey was indeed bewildering; all of China, in his view, was now in the power of the Tartars, and everywhere the prospect of finding even a single shelter from the wrath of the Empire seemed remote and渺茫. He murmured to himself: 'What is this 'Canyon of Sorrow' business?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Only then did I realize that the world was full of the tyrants, and there was no clean land to hide one's feet. True is it, that all the places where the wicked oppressors live are all over the earth. What is this place where I could avoid the evil?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But all along the road were impenetrable mountains of Tатraland, full of隐遁之地如焚琴片铁之竹林之国、高粱阻雾诸人之白驹之国、碧柳堤畔、黄龙谷下。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I felt that the world was full of the Qing Empire, with no clean land anywhere. I said, "Where is the place for a person to escape from a tyrannical emperor?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): His eyes travelled unceasingly across the desolate landscape. All were to him a foreign land ruled by the Tartars and incapable of being free from tyranny. In the end he could not help but mutter to himself: 'Where is that place of refuge, the Land of Noye, from which the cruel Chinman can protect me?

chinese: 有时你会觉着那里比较嘈杂，推开窗便噪声盈耳，你不要怪它，这就是简约人生聚沙成塔的动静。 他们毕竟是活泼泼的，也是要有些声响的。
english: On occasion you might feel that it is rather noisy—as soon as the windows were opened, your ears would be assaulted by all kinds of sounds. But don't be offended: what you hear are the accumulated sounds of the activities of prudent people over their lifetime; at least the noise shows that they are lively.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Sometimes you feel like there's a lot of noise around here, opening the window would make it louder than usual, so don't blame it on them. This is what makes life simple: it’s all about gathering sand together and making towers out of it. They’re lively and they need some sound.

For a moment it looks chaotic outside, but opening the window gives you a soundy view. Do not blame them—they are forming a cliff of sound just by letting loose. They are lively and want something back. They would disappear if they did not have something to go on their side.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Sometimes you may feel it is noisier there, and the noise will fill your ears when you open the window. Don't blame it; this is how the simple life of gathering sand into a tower produces some sound. They are lively after all, and they also need some noise.

But then you might hear the noise of the rush hour outside your window, noisy as a chorus of hurrying bodies. But why should you complain? That is the music of a simple life, the making-of-a-mess out of a handful of sand. They are lively, after all, and make sounds too.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: There are times when you feel that there is a lot of noise around you, opening the window would fill your ears with sound, so don’t blame it on them, this is what makes life simple. They are lively, too. So they need some sounds.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But then you might hear the noise outside the house—they would push open the windows and let the noise in. It was the noise that people made to keep things lively; it was also what gave life to simplicity.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Sometimes you may feel that it is noisy there, and the noise is so loud that it will deafen your ears when you open the window, but do not blame it because this is how the sand turns into a tower of simple life. They are lively after all, they make some noises too.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): ONE DAY YOU MIGHT LOOK OUT AND HEAR THE CRISIS AROUND YOU; but instead of complaining, you should be grateful for the noisy trinkets by which they keep life from becoming too still. After all, simplicity is the sound of trinkets gathering sand into a tower.

chinese: 突然心想：“满洲武士打不过茅大哥，茅大哥又不是老乌龟的对手，何不骗得老乌龟教我些本事？”

chinese: 这时，她倒平静下来，心情也松弛了，等那化妆师结束工作走开时，她甚至还生出几分幽默感同吴佩珍开玩笑。 吴佩珍说她简直像是嫦娥下凡，她就说嫦娥也是月饼盒上的嫦娥，于是两人都笑。
english: It was then that she began to calm down and her tensions eased. By the time the makeup man finished his job, she had even started to regain her sense of humor and joked around a bit with Wu Peizhen, who remarked that Wang Qiyao looked like the Lady in the Moon descending into the secular world, whereupon Wang Qiyao quipped that if she were a Lady in the Moon, she was the kind whose image was found on boxes of mooncakes. The two of them had a good laugh.

She even felt a little bit of humor towards Gao Pingxin. Gao Pingxin said that she looked like the moon goddess from another planet, and so did I. They both laughed.

Back then, she had calmed down and was in a good mood. When the makeup man finished his painting, she even took it as a compliment when he mentioned that Wang Qiyao was like the moon on her birthday, and that she was also an月饼盒子上的月亮，两人立刻就笑了。

She then said that the goddess was also a lady on a moon cake box. So they both laughed.

All of a sudden, she was surprisingly calm, and even gave Wang Qiyao a joke. Wang Qiyao imitated the beauty's accent and laugh out loud; then she changed the subject, saying how much she looked like the goddess Chang Yun (the box cake ad represented her as a beautiful woman with a full head of hair). They both laughed.

Then both of them laughed.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Only because I have not yet repaid him for his kindness of water, I even feel a lingering grief within me that is never-ending, saying: 'I myself received his rain and dew, but I do not have this water to repay him.'

It is because he has not yet been able to make a return towards the benefit of the rain and dew that all within him turns into a mixture of grievance and beauty. He says: 'I am the receiver of your rain and dew; you do not deserve to pay me back your water.

Translate the following Chinese text into English:

chinese: 国家兴亡，匹夫有责，暂时避祸则可，但若去躲在桃花源里，逍遥自在，忍令亿万百姓在鞑子铁蹄下受苦，于心何安？
english: The citizen of a conquered country still has his duty. It's all very well to take temporary refuge, but to live a life of ease in some Peach Tree Haven while millions are suffering under the iron heel of the Tartars would be less than human.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: The country's prosperity is at stake; we can be there temporarily if we hide behind a garden of flowers or live free from the shackles of government control. But if we stay in a place where people suffer under the iron fist of their enemies, how could our hearts be at peace?

Where do you want to hide when the country is in trouble?'-well, you can't stay at a far-off place like roses; your conscience won't allow you. But let us pretend to live in舒服的桃花源，and when the噩梦来临，当真的落到那芸念炎黄的铁枪和铜炮中，那可是死也不甘于命!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Responsibility for the fate of a country lies with all citizens. It is possible to temporarily avoid trouble but one must not hide away in some idyllic place, living life on the easy road. One must endure watching the suffering of millions of people at the mercy of the Tartar yoke.

Those who see themselves as responsible for their country should not shy away from facing up to the problems now confronting it. Temporal power is all that matters in the end, and hiding away in a green gourd's paradise is not going to cut it. If so doing were enough to protect them from ultimate disaster, we might question whether they were doing their duty; but it is estimated that tens of thousands of innocent souls in Russia are currently suffering under the yoke of the Tartars, and yet not a soul among them has dared to hide away rather than face up to the truth.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The nation's prosperity depends on us, so we can go out for a little while when necessary; but if we hide behind the Forbidden City, it is impossible for us to be free. What does that make our hearts?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Where do you want to hide?' I asked when we first arrived at Tangente. The place to live out our time here temporarily would have been a fair place to call home if we had chosen it. But we could only stay so long—hell, why should we?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Responsibility for a nation's rise or fall is on every citizen, but if one chooses to hide away in a "utopia" like a garden, how can they feel at peace with themselves knowing that their fellow citizens are suffering under the yoke of the Mongol horsemen?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Those who see themselves as responsible for their country should not shy away from doing what is necessary to avert it. In the short term such action would be justified; but to retreat into a utopia made of blooming apricots is not only enabling millions of subjects to kneel unceasingly under the Tartar iron foot, but utterly unacceptable.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The state of one's nation is in the hands of those who govern it; when you go there temporarily, you can do something about it. But if you stay behind in the land of the peasants and let them suffer under the iron heel of the conquerors, how can you feel at ease?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If there's to be national salvation,' he thought, 'I should at least prefer a life of luxury in a far-off valley where the roses and daises of heaven can be seen every day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Responsibility is something that belongs to every person, whether it be rich or poor. It’s always better to stay away from trouble temporarily, but if one chooses to hide in a utopia of his own making, then he should bear the responsibility for the suffering of millions of people under the yoke of the Mongols.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Even though the individual may feel at times like he is part of a safe haven, like Liu Bei in his Emerald Tunnel, it is not without consequence to put off the problems of nation on the one hand and of individual conscience on the other.

chinese: 他拿起一副走到车外戴上，透过镜片看到的城市夜景没有变化，只是暗了些，这时他才想起要将开关打开，立刻，城市化作一团团朦胧的光晕，大部分亮度固定，还有一些闪烁或移动着。
english: He put the glasses on and looked around. The city looked the same as before, only dimmer. Then he remembered that he had to switch them on. The city turned into many hazy glowing halos. Most were fixed, but a few flickered or moved.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: He took a pair of glasses out of his hand, then looked at the cityscape through the mirrors. The scene remained unchanged, but he realized that he needed to turn on the switch. As soon as he did, a dense fog appeared around him, mostly fixed in brightness. There were some lights moving or changing.

He hurried up the scooter and put on the mirror, where he stared at his cityscape, which had not changed in the street. Then, as a blanket of darkness covering everything, part of the frenzied mixture of colors in the city disappeared, and most of it flickered or moved, but there were moments when particular objects or moving things would shimmer.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: He picked up a pair of sunglasses, walked out of the car, and put them on. The city scene outside the car was not as bright as before. He then realized he should turn on the light switch immediately. Immediately, the city transformed into a foggy glow. Most of its brightness remained fixed, but some parts were still moving or flashing.

As he walked back to his place, he took off the pair of glasses and, through the lens-less viewfinder, saw that nothing had changed. He said, 'Let's turn the lights on.' And the screen suddenly lit up, most of which was fixed, with sparks of bright light here and there.

chinese: 他迷迷糊糊的睡了一会，悄悄起身，把那盒蜜饯糕饼揣在怀里，生怕惊醒海老公，慢慢一步步的蹑足而出，走到门边，轻轻拔开了门闩，再轻轻打开了一扇门，突然听得海老公问道：“小桂子，你去哪里？”
english: After sleeping fitfully for what must have been several hours, he got up silently, stuffed the box of cakes inside his breast pocket,and made his way on tiptoe across the room, pausing at each step for fear the old eunuch might waken. Then, slowly and gently, he slid back the door-bar and opened one of the leaves of the door. At that very moment he heard the old eunuch's voice calling out from behind him. 'Laurie, where are you going?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: He was drowsy for a moment before he slowly rose from his bed, and took the honey rolls and cookies in his pocket, fearing that they would wake up his husband, so quietly he walked along with him slowly until he reached the door and then gently opened the lock of the door, hearing his wife say in a low voice, "Where did you go, little桂子？"
But for a moment or two he was asleep until the old eunuch came冲击着他，悄声如鼠地从他身后悄悄走过，轻轻打开门，一睁眼，只见海老公站在门口，微笑道: "小桂子，你去了哪里？」
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: He fell asleep for a while and got up quietly. He put the box of sweet confection in his pocket, afraid to wake up his husband. He slowly walked out one step at a time and reached the door. He opened it gently and suddenly heard his husband ask, "Little Gaozi, where are you going?"

He slept vaguely for a while, too sleepy to dream, as he slipped out of bed, slid the box inside his jacket, and very carefully made his way to the door. With great care he inserted the catch and opened the door just a crack; then, very quietly, he slipped outside and drew the door open again, just above the old man's next question.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He was asleep for a moment, then he got up slowly, put the honey cake and pastry in his pocket, hoping not to wake up his husband. He stealthily walked out one step at a time, stepping through the door, then heard his husband say, "Little桂子，你在哪儿呢？"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Not knowing where he had fallen asleep, he got up from bed, surreptitiously stuffing the cake in his pocket, though he soon found he could not see the old eunuch when he stepped out of bed. He slowly strode towards the gate with the door open; then he heard the old eunuch asking, 'Little Liu, where have you been?'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He dozed off for a while, quietly getting up, taking the box of sweet cakes out of his pocket, afraid to wake up the sea husband, slowly making his way to the door, pulling the lock open with care, then opening another door slightly, suddenly hearing the sea husband say: "Little Guozi, where are you going?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He dozed off for a while on the floor without answering, then quietly slipped the box of Tartlets to himself. unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He was slumbering for a while, then quietly got up and took the honey cake and almond mousse out of his pocket, afraid that he would wake up his husband. unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He dozed off for a while, got up quietly, took out the box of sweet confection, hoping not to wake the sea husband, slowly making his way out of the room step by step until he reached the door. unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He drifted into a state of dim consciousness for a while, when, quietly getting up, he slipped the box of cakes and sweets into his pocket. So gently was he moving that he had to be careful not to wake the old eunuch. Replacing the door-lock carefully after he was sure that the old man was asleep, he very slowly opened another door, heard the old eunuch ask 'Where are you going, Laurie?' for the thousandth time, and slipped out through the doorway, for once, not backwards.

chinese: 不远处永远有一个工地，彻夜的灯光，电力打夯机的声音充满在夜空底下，有节律地涌动着。

chinese: 夜色灰葡萄，金风串河道，宝蓝色的天空深邃无边，绿色的星辰格外明亮。 北斗勺子星——北斗主死，南斗簸箕星——南斗司生、八角玻璃井——缺了一块砖，焦灼的牛郎要上吊，忧愁的织女要跳河…… 都在头上悬着。
english: On that grey-purple night a golden breeze followed the course of the river. The sapphire-blue sky was deep and boundless, green-tinted stars shone brightly in the sky: the ladle of Ursa Major (signifying death), the basket of Sagittarius (representing life); Octans, the glass well, missing one of its tiles; the anxious Herd Boy (Altair), about to hang himself; the mournful Weaving Girl (Vega), about to drown herself in the river. . . .
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: The night is gray with grapes, the wind blows through the river, blue skies stretch on out side of the eyes, green stars shine bright. The北斗七星——北斗主死了, the South Star —— South star was born; the eight-corner glass basin —— the one that has a stone missing from it, burning with anger for his wife, the lonely lady must be jumping off the river… They all hang above their heads.

The night turns as mauve into green, the black sky extends unboundless; the star of the River Of Gold – the constellation of current death – the Bell Pointrun of the South – the Crab of the Moon – a brick is missing – the woman of the North – she would have to jump into the river if she hung up her wedding ring – both women are mourning, unhappy, and their heads hang silently by their sides....
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Dark grapes of night, golden wind through rivers, a blue sky deep and vast, the green stars shine brightly. The spoon of the north star – death of the northern star, the箕-shaped star of south pole – life of the southern star, the glass well with eight corners – missing a brick, anxious shepherds want to hang themselves, worried weavers want to jump into the river… All hanging above their heads.

Underneath the dark green heavens, a Pocky Bridge, gilded windrows of wheat, and a deep-blue sky where even the stars seem unusually bright afford hints of what may lie in store for those who seek it—the Delimiter Pole shows that the Delimiters have fallen but the Stork Galaxy awaits birth, so the Delimiters' broken watermill indicates that there is a leak in the supporting beam that carries the mill's nameplate; moreover, the absent Guardian Star suggests that the wife of the delimiters has sunk into sorrowful melancholia about the loss of her husband, and the absent Observer Star forebodes that the wife will take her own life rather than burden herself with the pain of losing her husband.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The night ended with cloudy sown grapes, the cool wind blew through the vast gold-infused sky, where green stars shone bright. The北斗七星--the bull was dead today, while the sheep were born. The vixen rose up from the south, the tusk from the north fell from the wall, and unhappy Bellamy's wife — she would be hung for lacking a block of brick, and miserable Bellamah to jump into the river....']
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The night sky is a gray grape, golden wind winds through the river, the blue sky deep as infinity, the green stars shine brightly. The勺子北斗—主死的北斗，簸箕南斗—司生的南斗，八角玻璃井——缺少一块砖，焦灼的牛郎要上吊，忧愁的织女要跳河……都在头顶悬着。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Under cover of darkness, golden winds rustle the waterways; deep blue skies contain sparkling stars; and throughout this city of canals, they seem born of bronze. The all-seeing Sun is held down by a forked star, the fated Sun does not shine, but the lucky Star does — though its handle is missing from the bottle gourd dish. The broken-up glazed jar is held up by two protruding corners; the牛郎 and the fairy are so worried about their fate that they hang their heads and prepare to die, respectively.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The night is gray grapes, winds blow through a river of gold; the blue sky is vast and deep, and green stars shine brightly. The北斗七星——the star that died by the北斗主——is a symbol of death, while the constellation of the southern zodiac——the zodiac sign of the south——is a symbol of life. The eight corner glasses — the one missing from each corner of the eight corner glasses——are a reminder of the lack of a piece of stone in the constellation of the moon, which is burning with anger. The sorrowful mother of the Virgin Mary is hanging on her head. The sorrowful wife of the Starry Messenger is floating down the river of water.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The night almost pitch black, the red sunset illuminating the golden waters of the canal. The blue sky was unobstructed, without boundaries. Green stars shone bright, the北斗勺子星—its master dead, the Northern Bell Pole—was wobbly; the spotter's cowrie—its main body missing, a block of bricks, or the one-year bird—the one-year watcher wanted to hang it up, the mother of troubled females—to jump.... All three were hanging from their heads.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Black grapes under the night sky, golden wind weaving rivers, a deep blue sky, brilliant stars, and green stars. The勺子北斗——主死了，簸箕南斗——司生，八角玻璃井——少一块砖头，焦灼的牛郎要上吊，忧愁的织女要跳河……都在头顶挂着。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As the purple evening winds circled the canal, and the golden wind blew through the rivers and canals, Bao Blue Sky grew deep and deep until the stars shone brightly even in the sky overcast with black. The Bottle Neck Star pointed to the dead Sun, and the Dipper Star pointed to the living Moon; but Nanguan Lantern Jia was about to hang himself and Milky Way Girl was about to jump into the hole.

chinese: 韦小宝大喜，来不及装饭，夹起一块红烧肉便吃，虽然菜肴早已冷了，吞入饥肠，却是说不出的美味，心想：“这些饭菜不知是谁送来的。
english: Trinket was delighted, and without bothering to fill his bowl with rice, he attacked a dish of stewed meat. The food was cold, but he was hungry, and to him it was indescribably delicious. 'I wonder where they get the food from?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Wu Xiaowang was overjoyed at this news, but he hurriedly packed up his meal, and took out a piece of red-baked meat and ate it without thinking about it for a while. Although the food had already cooled down, he swallowed it with great hunger and couldn't say what a delicious taste it was. He thought: "These dishes must have been delivered by some one."

What warmth of appetite! Trinket ladled a large piece of red-hot meat that had been kept cold in an apron-pocket and gulped it up. Although the food had been brought over from Beijing, out of ignorance he could not speak of the delicious tempers of which there was such; though perhaps he would think more about their gift the next time he sat at the table.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Wu Xiaoya was overjoyed. He didn’t have time to take a meal, so he picked up a piece of red braised pork and ate it. Although the dishes were already cold, they tasted very good because they had just been eaten. He thought to himself, "I don’t know who sent me this food."

What happiness! Trinket was so excited he didn't even think about his meal. He grabbed a slice of red sauercure to go with his rice. The cold meat was far nicer than it had been an hour earlier, and he ate it with relish. He wondered who had brought him the meal.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wu Zai Ba is overjoyed at this moment, but he did not have time to pack food, so he took a bite of red meat and ate it up, even though the dish had already cooled down, swallowing the heat of his stomach made him unable to say anything delicious, thinking: "These dishes are not from whom they were given."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: What warmth of welcome! Trinket had already decided on a meal, but after swallowing the little parcel of cooled red meat in his mouth he no longer had much appetite, even though there seemed to be plenty of cold air in the carriage; 'I don't know who gave me that idea,' he thought. 'I can't tell you how they got hold of it, ' he added to himself. The fact was that the food hadn't been prepared by anyone—only someone from Shanghai had brought it.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wu Xiaopang was delighted. He did not have time to take his food, so he picked up a red braised pork and ate it. Although the dishes were already cold, they tasted delicious. He thought to himself: "I do not know who sent me this food."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: What happiness! Trinket grabbed a sandwich immediately. Too bad they were all cold! Still, it was wonderful to stuff his empty stomach with such delicious food. He wondered who had prepared this wonderful meal for them?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaowang was overjoyed when he heard that the food had been prepared by a person other than himself. He took a piece of red-baked meat and ate it while he was hungry. chinese: 田野里早已清静无人，在那个年头里，凡能吃上口饭的庄稼人都是早早地回家，不敢恋晚，一到夜间，高粱地就成了绿林响马的世界。
english: The fields were still and deserted. During those years, any farmer who had food at home left his field before nightfall, turning the sorghum fields into a haven for bandits.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: In fields far from human habitation, where there were no men eating food, was the year of old. The people who could eat had eaten long ago, and when they returned home, they were afraid that late night would come, for their cornfield was turned into a land of loud horses and brawls.

The field was clear of people almost overnight, as that was the week when everyone could have a meal consisting of an efficiently grown crop. When to go back home became a matter of life and death; otherwise, at night the sorghum field would turn into a maze of highwaymen.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: The fields were already quiet of late, when in that year a man could eat if he was not dead. At nightfall, the cornfields became the world for outlaws.
The fields were empty of people, quiet as the era required; nocturnal thuggery had taken hold of the sorghum fields.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In fields where peace is already tranquil, there was no one around in that year. The man who could eat food of a good kind was early on home when it came time for him to get up in the morning. There were tall grasses and wild beasts in the fields.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The field was clear of sound activity 27 hours a day; back then every farmer on our main production基地无论有没有粮食都必须早出晚归，不敢有早晚之别，晚上高粱的夜晚就是马灯世界的。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The fields were already quiet and deserted, for this year there was no one left who could not eat a meal. At night in these fields, robbers of corn stalks became the world's noise.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The field was empty of people by that time in history; farmers who could earn a living called home to avoid evening hours when banditry was at its height.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The fields are already quiet. In that year, every farmer who could eat good food was home by now. They were never late for meals, as there was no night when they couldn't get up at night. The wheat field had become a world of highlanders, musicians, and horses.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The field was clear of sounds even on this particular night, as the people on every farm in those days had already returned home early, afraid to take advantage of the warm evenings, leaving the sorghum fields to act as a new kingdom for those who讨饭。

chinese: 汪淼点点头，“用我们现有的分子建筑技术，只能生产出丝状的材料，粗细大约相当于头发丝的十分之一……

chinese: 他想着：“兄弟们一并都有父母教训，何必我多事，反生疏了。 况且我是正出，他是庶出，饶这样看待，还有人背后谈论，还禁得辖治了他？”
english: 'We are both equally subject to our parents' control,' he would say of himself and Jia Huan. 'Why should I create a greater distance between us by trying to control him myself – especially when I am the wife's son and he is the concubine's? People already talk behind our backs, even when I do nothing. It would be ten times worse if I were to start bossing him about.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: He thought: "The brothers all have parents' lessons; why do I bother? If that were the case, we would have been good friends. And what if I am a real man, he is a peasant, and I should see things as they are, so that there would be others who talk behind his back, and still govern him?"

That's just it,' he thought. 'Both of us will have parents' advice when we reach age; but the trouble is that I am a prospective scholar, she a commoner; and since I'm only at the beginning of my studies, compared with which they are both proficient I should be punished very reasonably. If there were such people as them to talk about and do anything else like that, I should have to put mine into practice very badly. But what I must remember is that they are only men, not women; and although they may speak ill of me publicly or私下，I am sure they shall be stopped before their words reach my mouth. And besides, even if they did do me any harm, I shouldn't feel need to deal with them publicly. '
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: He thought: "My brothers will be punished by their parents as well, why should I bother? It is more likely that I would become distant if I were to take care of this matter myself. Besides, my father is the firstborn, he has no need for a second child, so it's fine with me to look after him. But how can I allow others to speak ill of him behind my back?"

Things are worse than bad in one respect: all the errors of which I might be guilty are to be shared by the rest of the clan, so that there will be no cause for feeling inferior about my own shortcomings. Besides, I am the main source from whom this blame falls, whereas the other boys can evade it because they are only庶子; whereas my being the elder is counting against me. Even if there were no忌讳， my indiscretions could not so easily get out.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He thought: "The brothers have parents' instruction, why bother me? Besides, I am a senior citizen, he is a junior citizen, so what about this kind of treatment? And there are still others who talk behind his back, and they should be restrained."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: So he began by addressing his younger brothers. 'Both of us will have a father's instructions one way or the other. If we're not careful, our relations could become distant. After all, I am a candidate, and you are a Candidate-out. There is no cause for concern if we don't treat our relations properly; yet it would be very wrong to treat them unfairly. Then there would be others against us to go back on our word with, so I think it best that we should keep our relations correctly treated.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He thought: "Why should I be so troublesome? It would be too awkward for me. Furthermore, he is my elder brother who has a father, while I am his younger brother with no father, so how could I not look at him as someone with some authority? And then, there will be people behind my back talking about this matter, which I can't even manage."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: They have tutors to discipline them,' he thought; 'why should I go bothering about it? It would be awkward for them, and besides I am the chief one responsible, while there is always talk behind their backs and gossiping. What should I know about self-discipline?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He thought, "All my brothers have parents' advice; why should I be so troublesome? Besides, I am a senior citizen myself, and there is no need for me to speak ill of him. And how about what others say behind his back? Would it not be better if he was treated well?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): So he thought, their parents have surely looked out for them and done everything possible to see that their interests were met, yet even if they were high school students (which they were now) they had only the same rights as their erstwhile uncles and aunties; what would happen to them if they were treated unfairly or their interests were disregarded?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He thought, " Brothers all have parents' discipline, why should I bother about it? Besides, as I am born right out of the door, he is born from a lesser door, so let's just treat him lightly, but still, there will be people talking behind my back, how can I be able to control him?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They get taught by their brothers as well,' he thought. ‘Why should it be my duty to take them in hand? I could easily alienate them by doing so, especially since one of us is a principal citizen while the other a commoner, and there would be no one to restrain their backbiting.’

chinese: 奶奶嫁到单家，其实也是天意。 那天，我奶奶在秋千架旁与一些尖足长辫的大闺女耍笑游戏，那天是清明节，桃红柳绿，细雨霏霏，人面桃花，女儿解放。
english: Grandma's marriage into the Shan family was the will of heaven, implemented on a day when she and some of her playmates, with their tiny bound feet and long pigtails, were playing beside a set of swings. chinese: 一家四口，以务农为业。 因狗儿白日间自作些生计，刘氏又操井臼等事，青板姊弟两个无人照管，狗儿遂将岳母刘老老接来，一处过活。

Their current occupation was labouring, and with the dogs' time spent venturing odd jobs off-limits to adults, their only companion a useless twelve-year-old girl named Qing-pa on holidays, it wasn't very fulfilling for the four of them. chinese: 兄弟和梨洲兄推想，这次‘明史’一案所以如此大张旗鼓，雷厉风行，当是鳌拜意欲挫折我江南士人之气。”
english: Huang and I are both of the opinion that Oboi is at the back of this Ming History affair. The reason they are making such a song and dance about it and pursuing it with such ferocity is that he sees in it a means of breaking the spirit of the Southern gentry.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Brother and Liu Shenzhou suggested that this 'Ming Historian' case was so large-scale, with all the force acting in a swift manner. This must be the intention of Li Bo, who wants to cripple my Jiangnan scholars' spirit.

It's because of all that we're doing, then. This Time Explorer is taking on the Ming History business like a full-scale battle. We're aiming for the heart of the country this time. I've had Oboi wanting to挫折我江南士子之气，我要给他失败!'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit-run: Brothers and Lingzhou Brother speculate that this ‘Clear History’ case has been so publicized and briskly dealt with is because Aiqian wants to undermine our Northern Han people’s spirit.”

When we reflected, we concluded that this all appeared to be a big showy operation to scare off any further aspirants to the position of Count of Soochow and to deprive the Song people there of the means of maintaining their dignity,' said Gan.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Brother and Jiangzhuang Brother’s speculation is that this case of the '明史' was so big and fast because it was meant to crush the spirit of the Han people in Jiangnan.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: In our discussion we arrived at the conclusion that this time the 'History of the Ming Empire' had decided on a much greater scale than before. They had met up with all possible impracticality in order to try and upset Jiang Abi, who seemed, in their eyes, to want to挫折我江南士子之气.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Brothers and Liuzhou think that this case of ‘Clear History’ has been made such a big show because it is meant to undermine the spirit of the Northern Song people.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: We have to admit that this all began when Oboi wanted to crush the rising confidence of the Scholasticists in China.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Brothers and Li Hongzhi thought this was so because of the 'History' case, which is so large-scale and rapid in execution, indicating that the Reptile Emperor intended to cripple my Jiangnan scholars' spirit.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I was surprised when we 'push' Idek and Lü proposed this whole massive operation: 'The purpose of this extraordinary openness and enthusiasm in promoting the History Book is to挫折江南士子之气，使明朝学术权威不至于轻易得手。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Brothers and Lingzhou Brother conjecture that this case of ‘Clear History’ was so large-scale and urgent because it was intended by鳌拜要挫败江南文人的威望。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): We have to admit that this was a reaction to the failure of Ming History to achieve what it set itself. It seems clear from these circumstances that Oboi wanted to shut us up.'
